partial_progress.details: Resolved G and H case sorries using single-time invariant. Added h_single_time hypothesis to buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent. neg-Box/neg-G/neg-H cases have documented 'dead code' sorries for single-family/single-time hypotheses. Generic imp sorry remains (pattern matching limitation).

next_steps: Run /implement 864 to continue Phase 3b (generic imp resolution) or proceed to Phase 4

sorries_resolved: G case h_no_future (line ~3601) - resolved using no_future_times_of_single_time
H case h_no_past (line ~3732) - resolved using no_past_times_of_single_time
sorries_remaining: neg-G h_seed2_single_time (dead code - imp formula recursion)
neg-H h_seed2_single_time (dead code - imp formula recursion)
new_lemmas_added: map_modify_eq_map_of_eq - map commutes with modify for preserved fields
createNewFamily_timeIndices_new_family - new family has single time
notes.changes_summary: Added h_single_time : seed.timeIndices famIdx = [timeIdx] hypothesis to buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent. Threading this through Box/G/H cases enables proving addToAllFutureTimes/addToAllPastTimes are no-ops when only one time exists. The neg-* cases have sorries documented as 'dead code' since inner.neg is always an imp formula that never directly hits G/H cases.
